description: Factor level shows no lime applied
Factor level shows low lime treatment. No lime applied 1876-1904. Lime applied five times, 1905-1923 to plot 2aii, a total of 6.7t ha-1.  Plot 4b one application of 4.5 t ha-1 in 1915.
Factor level shows medium lime treatment. No lime applied 1876-1904. Lime applied once or twice, 1905-1921, plots 3aii, 3bii and 5aii
Factor level shows high lime treatment. No lime applied 1876-1897. Lime applied twice 1898-1912, plots 2bi, 2bii, 5b, 8aii, 8bii
